verses.verse: Cast <WH7971> thy bread<WH3899> upon<WH5921> <WH6440> the waters:<WH4325> for<WH3588> thou shalt find<WH4672> it after many<WH7230> days.<WH3117>

Give <WH5414> a portion<WH2506> to seven,<WH7651> and also<WH1571> to eight;<WH8083> for<WH3588> thou knowest<WH3045> not<WH3808> what<WH4100> evil<WH7451> shall be<WH1961> upon<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>

If <WH518> the clouds<WH5645> be full<WH4390> of rain,<WH1653> they empty<WH7324> themselves upon<WH5921> the earth:<WH776> and if<WH518> the tree<WH6086> fall<WH5307> toward the south,<WH1864> or<WH518> toward the north,<WH6828> in the place<WH4725> where the tree<WH6086> falleth,<WH7945> <WH5307> there<WH8033> it<WH1933> shall be.
He that observeth<WH8104> the wind<WH7307> shall not<WH3808> sow;<WH2232> and he that regardeth<WH7200> the clouds<WH5645> shall not<WH3808> reap.<WH7114>

As <WH834> thou knowest<WH3045> not<WH369> what<WH4100> is the way<WH1870> of the spirit,<WH7307> nor how the bones<WH6106> do grow in the womb<WH990> of her that is with child:<WH4392> even so<WH3602> thou knowest<WH3045> not<WH3808> <WH853> the works<WH4639> of God<WH430> who<WH834> maketh<WH6213> <WH853> all.<WH3605>

In the morning<WH1242> sow<WH2232> <WH853> thy seed,<WH2233> and in the evening<WH6153> withhold<WH5117> not<WH408> thine hand:<WH3027> for<WH3588> thou knowest<WH3045> not<WH369> whether<WH335> <WH2088> shall prosper,<WH3787> either this<WH2088> or<WH176> that,<WH2088> or whether<WH518> they both<WH8147> shall be alike<WH259> good.<WH2896>
Truly the light<WH216> is sweet,<WH4966> and a pleasant<WH2896> thing it is for the eyes<WH5869> to behold<WH7200> <WH853> the sun: <WH8121>

But <WH3588> if<WH518> a man<WH120> live<WH2421> many<WH7235> years,<WH8141> and rejoice<WH8055> in them all;<WH3605> yet let him remember<WH2142> <WH853> the days<WH3117> of darkness;<WH2822> for<WH3588> they shall be<WH1961> many.<WH7235> All<WH3605> that cometh<WH7945> <WH935> is vanity.<WH1892>

Rejoice, <WH8055> O young man,<WH970> in thy youth;<WH3208> and let thy heart<WH3820> cheer<WH3190> thee in the days<WH3117> of thy youth,<WH979> and walk<WH1980> in the ways<WH1870> of thine heart,<WH3820> and in the sight<WH4758> of thine eyes:<WH5869> but know<WH3045> thou, that<WH3588> for<WH5921> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things God<WH430> will bring<WH935> thee into judgment.<WH4941>

Therefore remove<WH5493> sorrow<WH3708> from thy heart,<WH4480> <WH3820> and put away<WH5674> evil<WH7451> from thy flesh:<WH4480> <WH1320> for<WH3588> childhood<WH3208> and youth<WH7839> are vanity.<WH1892>
